org.inventivetalent.mapmanager.event

Class MapInteractEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • org.inventivetalent.mapmanager.event.MapInteractEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Cancellable

    public class MapInteractEvent
extends org.bukkit.event.Event
implements org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
    Event called when a player interacts with a MapManager map in an ItemFrame
